about_the_game:
Missing Stars is a visual novel that aims to depict mental disorders and the people who live with them in a realistic, but sensitive and respectful light.

After an accident that left him traumatized, Erik Wilhelm transfers in to Privatgymnasium St. Dymphna, a special Viennese boarding school for teenagers and young adults struggling with their mental health. There, he meets a colorful cast of characters that will turn his formerly uneventful life upside down. As he settles into his new school, Erik will learn more about mental health and how to best approach it. Somewhere along the way, he might just find companionship, too...

Featuring:

  • Five unique routes with fun, endearing characters. With over 230,000 words, that leaves you with about 14 hours of readable content!
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Gallery/Music Room
  • Accessibility Options
  • Steam Achievements

This visual novel contains sensitive themes, including fictional depictions of psychological issues and trauma. All characters depicted are the age of 18 or older.
detailed_description:
Missing Stars is a visual novel that aims to depict mental disorders and the people who live with them in a realistic, but sensitive and respectful light.

After an accident that left him traumatized, Erik Wilhelm transfers in to Privatgymnasium St. Dymphna, a special Viennese boarding school for teenagers and young adults struggling with their mental health. There, he meets a colorful cast of characters that will turn his formerly uneventful life upside down. As he settles into his new school, Erik will learn more about mental health and how to best approach it. Somewhere along the way, he might just find companionship, too...

Featuring:

  • Five unique routes with fun, endearing characters. With over 230,000 words, that leaves you with about 14 hours of readable content!
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Gallery/Music Room
  • Accessibility Options
  • Steam Achievements

This visual novel contains sensitive themes, including fictional depictions of psychological issues and trauma. All characters depicted are the age of 18 or older.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

name: Missing Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
